summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3234 for the improvement of West McGraw Street, from Viewmont Way to Magnolia Boulevard; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40088, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
